title: Rhinella bergi
text: Rhinella bergi is a species of <a href="toad">toad</a>s in the family <a href="True%20toad">Bufonidae</a> that is found in <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a>, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, and <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are dry <a href="savanna">savanna</a>, moist savanna, subtropical or tropical seasonally wet or flooded lowland <a href="grassland">grassland</a>, freshwater <a href="marsh">marsh</a>es, intermittent freshwater marshes, <a href="arable%20land">arable land</a>, pastureland, and <a href="pond">pond</a>s. It is threatened by <a href="habitat%20destruction">habitat loss</a>.
